System Entries for Discontinuing an Award
To discontinue a beneficiary’s award based on the renouncement of the right to a benefit
select
Terminate – Renouncement
from the drop-down box for the DECISION field on the RECORD DECISIONS – BASIC ELIGIBILITY screen
enter the proper effective date (based on the instructions in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, 4.3.b
) in the AWARD EFFECTIVE DATE field
generate an award
prepare a decision notice, as described in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, 4.3.d
or
e
, and
send the claim for authorization.
Reference
:  For more information about processing renouncements in
VBMS, see the
VBMS-Awards User Guide
.
